places_with_reviews.name: Lords Plaza Ankleshwar
address: C4/6, GIDC, Old National Highway No. 8, Ankleshwar GIDC, Ankaleshwar, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393002, India

reviews.text: I stayed in Lords for 1 day business trip- room 212-The rooms are very spacious and clean. One suggestion, they can put a freshener like Godrej air, in the bathroom as it was giving stink smell. The staff is very courteous. The breakfast and dinner was excellent and food is very good indeed.

My stay at this hotel was a bittersweet experience. The staff mannerisms, good food, and high service levels are commendable. However, the worn-out infrastructure was a letdown.

While the hotel excels in human resources and service standards, there's a clear need for improvement in the infrastructure to enhance the overall guest experience.

I am sincerely grateful for the incredible kindness and cooperation extended by your staff. I wanted to express my heartfelt thanks for their prompt assistance in delivering my laptop charger safely to my home.
Two days after leaving the hotel room, I realized that my laptop charger was missing. The quick response and efficient service and daily follow up provided by your team were truly commendable. Their efforts have made a significant difference, and I am genuinely appreciative of their exceptional service.
Once again, thank you for the outstanding support and dedication of your staff.
A very nice place to stay.Neat and clean rooms and also house keeping staff is very supporting and well mannered specially Mr Nitish kumar.
Fantastic place to stay especially Gautam and Sonal were great to serve and positive attitude. Will recommend to my friends also.Superb experience.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sadanand
address: Sadanand Chokdi, Rajpipla Road, NH 48, Gadkhol Part, Hifazat Nagar, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393002, India

reviews.text: Had been to Sadanand Suratkal , and one at crawford market mumbai , but this one surprised me , super food , super ambience , and their nonveg menu is too good ... Don't miss this place when you are at bharuch , ankleshwar 😋

One of best hotel in the Ankleshwar. I never found well manner staff in the any other mid range hotels in the Ankleshwar compare with this hotel.Food quality is very good and taste is delicious. Served the food with maintain proper hygiene. Dinning room is well maintained and interior is also very nice.  Front space garden is also very good facilities for waiting.

It's nice place to stop for lunch or dinner if you are traveling mumbai to Ahmedbad.  Food quality is good. Service os excellent. On highway. Hygiene maintained.
North Indian cuisine is best.

I love the food abd service there. It has been there with the same good quality since I was a kid. The service staff is always polite. The food is always delicious and the quality is also good. You can see the food is handled with care.

I had a wonderful stay at Hotel Sadanand in Ankleshwar during my motorcycle journey from Gujarat to Mumbai. The ambiance was delightful, the food was delicious, and the rooms were spotlessly clean. What truly stood out was the exceptional hospitality, with a special thanks to Mr. Karan at the reception for his outstanding service. I would highly recommend this hotel to fellow travelers.

places_with_reviews.name: VITS Shalimar, Ankleshwar
address: Valia Road, Near G.I.D.C. Reservoir, J274+VCH, Ankleshwar GIDC, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393002, India

reviews.text:
A very nice property. Very good food and smiling service. Stayed for 5 days.
They treat foreigners nicer than native Indians.
This is nothing less than 5 stars. But 4 are given as
1. The water supply for room 308 was not with intermittent force sometimes on or off for the shower.
2. The restaurant served us food pretty slowly. We wanted to have a quick lunch...but our first dish took more than 1 hr. They improved on the next days

Very lovely business types rooms.
Service is late and not too great
Location could have been better there are other things to do.
Very noisy most of the time as there are weddings all throughout the year

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Vits Shalimar Hotel Ankleshwar, and it was truly a delightful experience. From the moment I entered, the warm and inviting ambiance set the tone for a memorable stay.

The rooms at Vits Shalimar are not only well-appointed but also exude comfort. The attention to detail in the room's decor and amenities was commendable, making my stay incredibly enjoyable.

One of the standout aspects of my visit was the culinary experience. The hotel's restaurant offered a diverse menu, and every dish I tried was a culinary delight. The chefs at Vits Shalimar have truly mastered the art of creating delicious and memorable meals.

What sets Vits Shalimar apart, besides its comfortable accommodations and fantastic dining options, is the impeccable service. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my stay was enjoyable. Their friendliness and attentiveness added a personal touch to the overall experience.

In conclusion, Vits Shalimar Hotel Ankleshwar exceeded my expectations in every aspect. It's a perfect choice for those seeking a blend of luxury, excellent dining, and top-notch service. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Ankleshwar.

The rooms are nice, the location is beautiful, and the food is also great but there is a big problem with the internet not working in certain Rooms. Staff had to be called several times before they responded to your demands.

Location is highly polluted area. Rooms maintenance is very poor, exhaust fan is not working in toilet, taps leakage, room size is small and tariff is very high. Quality of food is too bad. No proper service from the hotel management as well

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Narmada Gate

reviews.text:
It's an okish hotel. Nothing great about it.
Rooms are big but not well maintained.
We asked for large beds but got twin sharing beds.
No room service available. No lifts and we got room on 2nd floor.
Ample parking available

Very nice place and well connected to the main road highways. The food quality is very good and freshly made. You will find good vegetarian thaali options in gujrati food. The tea, coffee and hot milk with sugar for kids is also available on demand. The quality of food is adequate and service is very quick. There is also option for you to pick local snack from the counter like biscuits, wafers and other local snack like peanut bar and peanuts, chewing gum, mint, chocolate bar etc
Good hotels with tasty food.

Hotel Narmada Gate is a popular hotel located in the city of Bharuch in Gujarat, India. The hotel offers a range of rooms, including deluxe and executive rooms, to cater to the needs of different travelers. The rooms are well-furnished and equipped with modern amenities like air conditioning, television, and Wi-Fi. The hotel also has a restaurant that offers a variety of dishes, including local Gujarati cuisine and other Indian and international delicacies. The restaurant is known for its delicious food and great service. The hotel also has a conference room and banquet hall, making it a popular choice for business meetings and events. The staff members are friendly and attentive, providing excellent customer service. The location of the hotel is also convenient, with easy access to the city's main attractions and transportation hubs. Overall, Hotel Narmada Gate is a great choice for travelers looking for comfortable accommodation with modern amenities and excellent service in Bharuch.

Nice restaurant on side of the highway you must visit when you are traveling , breakfast,tea and coffee , lunch , dinner available , budget friendly place , wheelchair accessible area, and car parking available , hygienic washrooms and good sitting arrangements , service available

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sun Plaza
address: C/513 Near Gidc Bus Depot N.h No-8, Ankleshwar GIDC, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393001, India

reviews.text:
Hi, we have reached in the morning today. We came here to attend someone special's function. Here, Staff members behave like we are just coming to do some vulgar activities. These guys also don't allow us to enter in the banquet hall.

This feels so embarassing to us as a guest. This is so ridiculous behavior.

Personally i didn't like that much. Price is ok but for same price you can get other hotels with better facilities.

Rooms are soo congested, food menu you find only veg. They will allow outside food in room no issues.

Staff should be trained.

The infrastructure of the hotel is good and full of facilities. And the cleanliness of all the rooms is very good. You can spend your time here comfortably. The behavior and thoughts of all the hotel staff are impressive. This hotel is very close to the highway.

I had stay here in August 2019.

thank you

Don't know about food quality as we have takem only cold drinks here. But i think there will be good option for lunch and dinner. We found varieties of mouth freshener here.

We stayed for a snacks and tea while traveling to saputara around 2 AM and still their fast food corner service open for what we ordered. Also for kid's they have plenty of space and rides for them to enjoy over there. Best place to hold on your travel in between Mumbai or surat travelers..

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Monarch Excellency
address: Plot No: C/3/7, Parshwanath Complex GIDC Road Opp. Railway Street East, Gadkhol Part, GIDC, Ankleshwar GIDC, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393002, India

reviews.text: We had a overnight stay for transit. Overall experience was satisfactory. They don’t have lift, difficult for seniors and disabled. One of the rooms flush was not working. Recommended only if you are passing by the NH48 highway and need to stay overnight. Food was average.
Everything is good. Room service is good and quick. Near to bus stand and Railway station . The only thing that needs to be improved is the food menu and taste. Overall 👍.

Room was ok but paint smell was coming throughout the area and wash basin tap was broken. Regarding service the receptionist and the owner has two different opinion towards there policies one is saying children above 5 years is chargeable and the other is saying any age child is chargeable. They had charged me 300rs more for below 5 year child as if he aquire one full bed and they also dint give extra bed after charging it.

It was a nice experience staying in this hotel. Spacious rooms, excellent room service and immediate response. Nearer to the Railway station.
This hotel is extremely suitable for family also. I enjoyed the service and staff behaviour n approach  more than expected.
The room was good and the hospitality  was much better . The room was neat and clean  and the bathroom was also neat and clean.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Silver Leaf
address: Hexzone Arcade plot no 623/3/A, next to Jaya Ben Modi hospital, GIDC, Ankleshwar GIDC, Ankleshwar, Gujarat 393002, India

reviews.text:
My experience at this hotel was far from satisfactory. Upon arrival, the hotel's appearance left much to be desired. The first thing that struck me was the overpowering, unpleasant chemical odor that permeated the entire lobby and hallways. It was so strong that it made my stay uncomfortable from the start.

In addition to the initial concerns, there were further disappointments. We had requested water bottles, but they did not arrive on the first attempt, which was inconvenient. Access to drinking water is a basic expectation for any hotel, and such requests should be promptly fulfilled.

Furthermore, the malfunctioning AC was a significant issue. The fact that the maintenance staff arrived after we were already asleep was highly inconvenient and disrupted our comfort during the stay.

The condition of the towels and linen provided in my room was equally disappointing. They were worn out, discolored, and had seen better days. It was evident that they were in desperate need of replacement, which greatly affected my perception of the hotel's cleanliness and attention to detail.

To make matters worse, the room service at this hotel was practically non-existent. I had hoped to enjoy some meals in the comfort of my room, but the service was slow, and the limited menu options were disappointing. It was frustrating to have to wait for extended periods, only to receive subpar food that didn't justify the high prices.

In summary, my stay at this hotel was marred by an unappealing appearance, an unpleasant chemical odor, substandard towels and linen, a lackluster room service experience, delayed response to basic requests like water bottles, and a malfunctioning AC that was addressed only after a considerable delay. I would strongly advise management to address these issues promptly to provide a more pleasant and comfortable stay for future guests.

A good place to visit at a proper location. Very clean rooms. The best hotel in town.  The response of management is poor. I missed some of my items here while leaving. Sent a mail as well as a call about it but no response.
Very nice hotel well cleaned rooms and nice food, but breakfast is quite costly but it's ok ok
